original_title: New Year’s Eve Concert 2019 - An Evening With Broadway Melodies
overview: Kirill Petrenko conducts this live performance of the Berliner Philharmoniker with Diana Damrau. The programme features works by Richard Rodgers, Kurt Weill, Stephen Sondheim and Harold Arlen.
title: New Year’s Eve Concert 2019 - An Evening With Broadway Melodies
